entries.title: Add thread-safe read methods to OutputBag
entries.description: OutputBag should provide thread-safe read operations that either acquire the lock or return immutable snapshots. Consider adding a snapshot() method that returns a consistent view of the OutputBag state.
entries.context: Current read methods are unprotected while writes use asyncio.Lock()
entries.rationale: Users expect consistent reads from a shared data structure
entries.proposed_solution: Add: 1) A snapshot() method that returns a frozen copy of all entries, 2) Make all existing read methods acquire the lock for consistency
entries.roleplay_perspective: As a reliability engineer, I need to know that reading from OutputBag during parallel execution will always return consistent results.
